articles.title: How to live longer: Mediterranean diet linked to lower risk of death - Toys Matrix
articles.description: Cancer and cardiovascular diseases occupy four of the top ten leading causes of global mortality according to a 2020 WHO report.A massive factor for the prevention of cardiovascular diseases, and diabetes (which ranked 9th on the WHO report) is diet.
